entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as a gamekeeper at Hogwarts who offers his arm to Madame Maxime. He is described as gruff and has a harebrained scheme in hand.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is introduced as having giant winged horses and is shown to be playful and flirtatious. She is not hard to miss.

relationships.description: Hagrid offers his arm to Madame Maxime and they walk together around the paddock containing her giant winged horses.
Hagrid shows Madame Maxime something, but it is not clear what it is.
